descriptions.createdSurveys: Manage and view all the surveys you have created. Track responses and edit your surveys.
descriptions.responded: View all the surveys you have responded to. Continue incomplete responses or review completed ones.

empty.title: No surveys created
empty.description: You haven't created any surveys yet. Get started by creating your first survey.

empty.title: No surveys responded
empty.description: You haven't responded to any surveys yet. Respond to a survey to see it appear here!

create.title: Create a survey
create.description: Fill in the basic information to create your survey. You'll be able to add questions after creation.
